concept.description: Labels all types annotated with "@org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController" with "Spring", "RestController", "Controller" and "Component".
concept.cypher: MATCH (restController:Type)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestController" SET restController:Spring:RestController:Controller:Component RETURN restController as RestController
